name: Zinky
description:
Demo of our Game Zinky.

Game made with love by Wild Rats Games https://wildrats.games

We make this game for you, the players. Please let us know what you want for the game. We want you to have a good time. Give us some feedback here: https://forms.gle/iEhSK1CveHy7Q6FW6
